Event Cancellation Policy
1.
The Ave Maria Master Association reserves the right to cancel or postpone events or activities based on levels of program registration. If a program is cancelled by the Master Association due to insufficient enrollment, all registrants will be notified in a timely manner, and the full cost of the program refunded.
2.
Although the Ave Maria Master Association generally adheres to a “No Refund” policy, refunds may be considered when extenuating circumstances exist and a written request is received at the Association office at least two days prior. For bus trips, a 30-day cancellation is required for a full refund, however, no refunds will be issued for ticketed items such as theater or sporting events.
3.
The Ave Maria Master Association requires 72-hour cancellation notice for all Lifestyle Events. Due to space limitations for some events, adhering to this policy ensures your neighbors, who may be on a waiting list, can be notified that a spot has opened for them. If you need to cancel your reservation, please e-mail Ericka Sanchez at ericka.sanchez@fsresidential.com.

CONTACTS
AVE MARIA MASTER ASSOCIATION:
As the front line of customer service in the community, the staff members have been empowered to work directly with you to resolve your concerns, answer your questions, or direct you to the appropriate member of the FirstService Residential Team.
If you have administrative questions about the Association, Business Committees, Board of Directors, or general concerns you're not able to resolve with staff assistance, please feel free to contact us.
Click here for the Ave Maria Master Association management contacts!
Address

Community Events
Check here to see community events hosted by Ave Maria Development, the town center merchant group, Ave Maria community organizations, sports groups, schools, the university, and parish functions open to our residents. Some of the master association clubs and events are also included. Events will be updated as they are received.
Community Organizations:
Ave Maria University Page Events
(Click the link to keep updated -
https://avemaria.edu/events
)
